description:
This is a comfortable and clean studio apartment on the UES, 30 seconds from the subway (literally!) and central to restaurants, shops, supermarkets, museums, and parks. Within you will find fresh sheets and blanket, clean towels,  drawers for your belongings, a desk, flat screen TV (Netflix), Wifi, a queen size mattress, a complete bathroom, and a small kitchen -help yourself to the pantry, coffee, and tea. You control the heat. I also have a humidifier and air purifier.

Two room studio with a separated kitchen and bedroom. The apartment is on the second floor and it is a walk up.
name: Comfortable and Clean Studio in UES
review: Lo mejor de este lugar es la ubicación tan cercana a una estación del subway ,además de lo limpio y acogedor ,con un supermercado en la esquina que funciona 24 horas y central park a pocas cuadras y muy agradable para caminar.
